casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

March 21, 2008

[Cite as 03/21/08 Case Announcements, 2008-0hio-1268.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2007-1718. Brown v. Levin.

Board of Tax Appeals, No. 2006-R-1041. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Board of Tax Appeals. Upon consideration of appellee’s motion for summary affirmance,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is denied.
